data: Being an author actually at work, and not an author being photographed at work by a lady admirer, he did not gaze large-eyed at a poppy in a crystal vase, one hand lightly touching his forehead, the other tossing off page after page in high godlike frenzy.
bestsellers, american, 1895-1923|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: american literature|category: gender & sexuality studies
